alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Coffee; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 30 at 6:09AM EDT until further notice by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Florida, including the following areas, Baker, Bradford, Coastal Nassau, Eastern Alachua, Gilchrist, Hamilton, Inland Nassau, Northern Columbia, Southern Columbia, Suwannee, Union, Western Alachua and Western Marion. Portions of southeast Georgia, including the following areas, Appling, Atkinson, Bacon, Brantley, Clinch, Coastal Camden, Coastal Glynn, Coffee, Echols, Inland Camden, Inland Glynn, Jeff Davis, Northeastern Charlton, Northern Ware, Pierce, Southern Ware, Wayne and Western Charlton. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Tropical Cyclone Idalia is expected to bring up to 3 to 6 inches of rain, with locally higher amounts, to the watch area, which may lead to flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
